name: Franken Fighter (LittleBeardMan)
description:
You are a new assistant at the lab of the famous Doctor Franken. Although something seems off when you arrive there. Assemble a monster using body parts you find throughout the facility and defeat other monsters who stand in your way.

CONTROLS:

Arrow Keys: Move/Navigate menus

Z: Confirm/Select

X: Cancel/Exit

Enter: Pause game
